trans-unit.source: Articles for Virtual Machines in Service Management | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Articles for Virtual Machines in Service Management | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: This article lists resources to help you create and manage virtual machines in Azure Service Management.
trans-unit.target: This article lists resources to help you create and manage virtual machines in Azure Service Management.

trans-unit.source: Articles for virtual machines in Service Management
trans-unit.target: Articles for virtual machines in Service Management

trans-unit.source: This is a list of articles for working with virtual machines in Azure Service Management.
trans-unit.target: This is a list of articles for working with virtual machines in Azure Service Management.

trans-unit.source: For new deployments, we recommend the use of Azure Resource Manager–based virtual machines and other resources.
trans-unit.target: For new deployments, we recommend the use of Azure Resource Manager–based virtual machines and other resources.

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the advantages of Resource Manager, see <link><linkText>Azure compute, network, and storage providers under Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For an explanation of the advantages of Resource Manager, see <link><linkText>Azure compute, network, and storage providers under Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title></link>.
